content:
Let's actually start with Chapter 6. Please write a 200 word transition on how the mirror comes to be in the house of either the son or daughter of George, who has lost his wife tragically, then write an 80--1000 word chapter. (Reminder, here are the key points that this chapter will focus on: The mirror is inherited by an elderly man, George, who lost his wife.
George becomes isolated and fixated on the alternate future the mirror shows him.
George struggles to let go of the alternate future and the memories it brings back.
George's relationship with his son and daughter becomes strained as his obsession with the mirror grows.)
